files.description: Python script that finds agent-specific output artifacts (e.g., code-creation/**/outputs/*), consolidates them into the canonical outputs/ scaffold, and optionally updates CHANGELOG.md while preserving existing canonical files deterministically.
Standalone artifact gate checker that validates the required canonical output paths exist and match expectations defined in config/artifact_gate_paths.json, exiting nonzero on any mismatch.
Canonical allowlist of required artifact file paths under outputs/ used by the artifact gate checker to enforce exact locations.
Canonical consolidated task taxonomy codebook artifact JSON produced by agents, placed under the single outputs/ scaffold for gating and downstream use.
JSON Schema for outputs/task_taxonomy_codebook_v0.1.json to enable validation and ensure consistent structure for artifact gate and consumers.
Minimal example instance conforming to the task taxonomy codebook schema demonstrating expected fields and formats for documentation and validation.
Updated changelog documenting consolidation of agent-produced outputs into outputs/ and the artifact gate update to enforce these canonical paths.

missionDescription: Consolidate agent-produced outputs currently living in agent-specific directories (e.g., code-creation/.../outputs/task_taxonomy_codebook_v0.1.json and related schema/example files) into the single canonical /outputs scaffold, update CHANGELOG, and ensure the artifact gate checks these exact canonical paths.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Current artifacts exist but are fragmented across directories, which prevents reliable reuse and automated gating. A single canonical location is required for reproducible builds and QA enforcement.
